summary: Provides unit tests that verify the edgewise message‑passing primitives of the PyTorch backend, checking node‑to‑edge attribute propagation, edgewise dot‑product computation, and binary operations between source and destination node features on both homogeneous and heterogeneous graphs.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and stability of edgewise operations in the graph neural network library’s PyTorch implementation, supporting diverse graph types for reliable downstream model training and inference.
